sentences.en: ...a twisted urge to rend and tear.
sentences.cn: ...一股反常的狂乱撕扯的冲动。

sentences.en: a shrill scream rent the air.
sentences.cn: 一阵尖声惊叫划破长空。

sentences.en: Bloodletting has been renamed to Improved Rend once again, and doesn't affect Bloodbath anymore.
sentences.cn: 放血重命名为增强割裂, 并且不再影响血浴.

sentences.en: Can the and bloody victim love the blood - splashed jaws that rend him limb from limb?
sentences.cn: 鲜血横流的受害者能否“爱”那将他撕碎的血口?

sentences.en: Good morning ． Tried and True Rend - a - Car.
sentences.cn: 早上好,是诚信租车公司.

sentences.en: He was not so careful to rend the vase to pieces.
sentences.cn: 他真不小心,把花瓶打成了碎片.

sentences.en: Rend - Base damaged increased from 300 to 450 for max rank.
sentences.cn: 撕裂 - 最高级技能基础伤害从300增加到450.

sentences.en: Rend Flesh: Deals 2,335 damage every second for 5 seconds. Only used in phase two.
sentences.cn: 撕裂血肉: 在五秒内每秒造成2335伤害. 只在阶段二使用.

sentences.en: The Rend Blackhand arena event in Upper Blackrock Spire will now properly reset after a wipe.
sentences.cn: 黑上雷德黑手竞技场在团灭后会正确的重置了.

sentences.en: The sound of truth will rend the air a shaft of lightening.
sentences.cn: 真相的声音将像闪电撕裂夜空.

sentences.en: W ? rend ein Stunde Schifffahren habe ich den sch ? nen Landschaft hier geschaut.
sentences.cn: 一望无际的湖面,仿佛来到大海一般.

sentences.en: Will they rend the child from his mother?
sentences.cn: 他们会不会把这个孩子从他的母亲身边夺走 呢 ?

sentences.en: Wolves will rend a lamb to pieces.
sentences.cn: 狼群会把一只羔羊撕成碎片.

phrases.tran_cn: 揪扯衣服（或部分头发）以示极度悲痛；捶胸顿足

trans.tran_en: to tear or break something violently into pieces

trans.tran_cn: 撕碎，分裂，（因愤怒、痛苦等而）揪扯（衣服或头发等），（声音等）刺破
